role_definition: The Service Domain fulfills a general leasing arrangement for a single leased product or facility. The bank will take a collateral interest in the leased item to underwrite the associated loan/lease arrangement
example_of_use: A customer requests a leasing arrangement to support the acquisition of equipment
executive_summary: The leasing products enables customers to finance equipment purchases using the leased item as collateral when necessary
key_features: Review collateral value and title of leased item
Initiate and maintain the leasing arrangement through term
